name: Just keep going --->
description:
(Make sure your volume is loud so you can hear one of the easter eggs!!)

My first functioning game where all you have to do is hold right! This is more or less just to see what scratch can do, but I had a lot of fun making it.
Easter eggs:
1. "Beat the game"
2. "Lose the game"
3.  "The man behind the slaughter" (Press "P")
(Make sure to restart after every easter egg)
Btw, this is my first game, and I made it on scratch, but I hope ya'll can still enjoy!)
And please comment if you find all the endings! I'll be back to clean the game up later.
